EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Early Withdrawal Notice Spring Term 2014
EmailTemplate.subject: Early Withdrawal Notice Spring Term 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
In case you are planning to withdraw your child(ren) at the end of the Spring term (11th April, 2014), please be informed of the deadline for submission of the withdrawal notice, in order to receive reimbursement of the Development Contribution fee or an Early notice payback.
Please inform the Admissions department about your intentions by email no later than 1st February, 2014. Once we receive your email, we will then send you an online Withdrawal Form for you to complete, which we will receive automatically once its submitted.
If we do not receive your email by 1st February, 2014 your request will unfortunately be outside of the reimbursement time frame.
Please contact us should you have any questions in this regard.
Best regards,
Admissions Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
